page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: My mum works at Wardle High School. She is a cleaner and she works from Mon-Thurs because on Friday she finishes half an hour early at night. My mum has lots of friends at Wardle High because she says that there are a lot of nice people there.She doesn't mind working there because it is just down the road from our house. At Christmas they have Christmas parties and most of them get a little bit drunk. My mum also knows most of the teachers (so I had better be careful!)I don't like it very much when we have to have tea at 6.30p.m. My mum is not in to cook my breakfast and get me up so I have to do it myself.Every night she comes home and says "I've had a very busy day." We all try to help her.I am looking forward to starting at high school in September.
